answers.answer: Any precautions I should be taking? Certain foods I should avoid until I know for sure?
Stay away from sweets if you are worried but keep calm dont wanna stress your lil one
Just because you threw up does not mean you have it. I threw up during my 3 hour and I don't have it,I passed with no problem. You just have to eat healthy stuff like you should be anyways.
My Sistet Had Gestational Diabetes It's Not Hurting Your Baby It's Just Making Them Gain Lots Of Weight .

question: So as I said in an earlier post I wasn't able to complete my 3 hr glucose test because I threw it up. I can't go back and try it again until Monday. But what I'm worried about now is what if I do have  gestational diabetes and what I'm eating is hurting my baby?? I know nothing about this so I'm scared. Any advice or info??
title: I really need advice..
